“I don’t think we’ve ever done this, but I know what you mean.” Looking at me, Glenn said, “We used to do everything together; but since all this happened, you’re spending most of your time with Kat and Mom.”

“They’re helping me learn to be a girl.” Smiling, I said, “But if it makes you feel better, I’ll make sure to spend time with you as well,”

“That’s all I ask.”

We continued to dance for another few seconds; until we were suddenly interrupted by someone yelling, “Where’s my son?”
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The Party

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Everyone turned in response to the shout. We all knew Mackenzie and Rachel's father, of course, but none of us had ever seen him like this. He staggered to the center of the dance floor as the band stopped playing.

"I said, where's my damn son?" he slurred. "Get him out of that stupid dress this instant!"

I moved between him and Rachel. "I don't know about your son," I said, "but your daughters are here. Why don't you have some coffee - "

"This doesn't concern you," he replied, "you little freak."

"Y-you're wrong. Your daughter is my cousin, so anything that concerns her concerns me."

"I said, shut up!" With that, he backhanded me, sending me sprawling, and producing a familiar throb, in my right eye this time.

Then, I heard Glenn say, "That's my little sister, you jerk!" and the sound of a punch. The cheers that followed told me who hit who.

Glenn helped me up. "You okay?"

I tested my eye. "Nothing wrong that an ice pack and some makeup won't fix. You?"

"Hurt my hand a little."

Rachel came over. "Thank you. Both of you."
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Rachel's Father

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The cops came soon after to arrest Rachel and Mackenzie’s dad. Of course, they had to talk with Glenn about what happened; but they decided not to press charges after they realize he’d just been protecting Rachel and me.

I was sitting back at the table, my eye throbbing, when Rachel came walking over. Handing me a Ziploc bag of ice, she said, “I’m so sorry, Cassidy.”

Placing the bag over my eye, I said, “It’s not your fault.”

“He only hit you because you were protecting me.”

Looking at Rachel, I said, “I’d do it again in a heartbeat.”

Glenn walked over at the moment. Looking at my black eye, he said, “How’s your eye, sis?”

“Hurts a bit more than when that bitch Angela punched me.” Sighing, I said, “But I’ll manage.”

Rachel came over and hugged Glenn. “Thanks for looking out for me, Glenn.”

“Anytime, Rachel.”

Just then we were joined by Mackenzie and our oldest cousin, Elizabeth. “Do you mind giving us a moment, Glenn?” Elizabeth said, “This is just something for us girls.”

Rachel and I smiled when we heard that; it was nice to know some people accepted us for who we were. After Glenn walked off, I said, “What’s up, Liz?”

“I have a favor to ask of the three of you.” Pausing, Elizabeth said, “I was wondering if you’d all like to be junior bridesmaids in my wedding?”

Elizabeth and her fiancé, David, were getting married in 4 months. I hadn’t expected to be asked to be in the wedding party, and I had no idea what a junior bridesmaid was. Judging from the looks on Rachel and Mackenzie's faces, they didn’t know either. “What’s a junior bridesmaid?”

“You’ll be a part of the wedding party,” Elizabeth explained. “You’ll be escorted down the aisle by David’s junior groomsmen; then you’ll stand at the altar with me and the bridesmaids.”

“Are you sure you want us in the wedding party?” concerned, Rachel said, “It’s not like I’ll have developed much in 4 months, and Cassidy might still be adjusting.”

“I don’t care about any of that.” Smiling, Elizabeth said, “You three are my cousins and I want you all up at the altar with me.”

The three of us exchanged looks for a moment; until I turned to Elizabeth and said, “We’d love to.”

“That’s great!” hugging the three of us, Elizabeth said, “I can’t wait to bring you three dress shopping; I’m sure you’ll look amazing in the bridesmaid's dresses.”

As I stood there hugging Elizabeth, I started to wonder what I’d just gotten myself into. “I can’t wait.”

Noticing the rest of the family was gathering around Nana, Mackenzie said, “It looks like it’s time for the family photo.”

“Hopefully, the photographer can do something about my eye.”
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The Aftermath

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Luckily, the photographer's assistant carried a makeup kit with her, and covered up the bruising. "Looks like your other eye got some attention, too," she said.

"Yeah," I replied, "I'm getting to be a pro at taking punches to the eye."

"Same reason?"

"No, my left eye was by a girl who didn't like people looking at the guy who dumped her."

"Well, I'm done here. Go pose with your grandmother."

******************************************************************** ****


After the pictures, people started talking about what had just gone down. Most of it was some variation of "I can't believe he did that."

Mom pulled my aunt aside. "This can't be good news for your marriage."

"We're getting divorced, anyway. At least the girls will be away from him."

"What's the next step?"

"I've already got a new place. And Cassidy is going to have a couple of familiar classmates."

"Well, that is good news. I'm glad to see you landing on your feet."

"Hey, I figure, if Cassidy can hit the ground running, so can I."
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The rest of the weekend was uneventful; I spent most of my time at the pool with Mackenzie, Rachel and Elizabeth. It felt weird to hang out with them so much since before the procedure I’d be more likely to hang out with Glenn or Chris.

It was 2:30 PM and we had about an hour to go until we were home. I’d just woken up from a nap and was going through my text messages; there was one from Eric and a few from Brian. I didn’t want to talk to Eric, but I knew he’d keep pestering me until I caved.

“I got an email that your present was delivered today.”
“I hope you enjoy it.”

“Thanks.”


Then came the texts from Brian; ever since I’d told him what happened with Rachel’s dad, he’d been making sure I was okay.

“I know you’ll probably be tired from the long weekend.”
“But I was hoping you’d like to get together tonight.”

I smiled when I saw those texts. Brian kept insisting he wanted to take things slow, but I had a feeling he didn’t really mean it.

“I’d love to get together.”
“What were you planning?”


“The summer carnival’s in town for one more night.”
“I was hoping you’d like to come with me.”

“Sounds like fun.”
“For once I can go there and actually walk around.”


“Great! I’ll pick you up around 6:30.”

“C u then!”
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The Ride Home

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
It was shortly after 4:00 that we finally got home. As Dad pulled into the driveway, I saw a package waiting on the porch. Must be Eric’s present.

While Dad and Glenn got the luggage, Mom and I went inside. Grabbing the package, I carried it upstairs to my room. Closing the door, I placed the package on my bed; wondering if I should really open it.

After a moment’s indecision, I sat down on the bed with the package in my lap. Ripping the box open, I saw a card taped to another wrapped box. Opening the card, I read the note that was inside:

Sorry this is so late, but I think you’ll get a lot of enjoyment out of this
-- Eric

Putting the card aside, I took the other box out and started to rip off the wrapping paper. Once I’d finished, I got a good look at the contents and immediately regretted it. Eric had given me a vibrator for my birthday.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A Disturbing Surprise

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
I screamed when I realized what I was holding.

That caused Mom to come running in. "What is it?" she asked. "What's wrong?"

"E-Eric... " I showed her what he had sent me.

She said nothing. She just took the vibrator, the box it came in, and Eric's note, and took them to Dad.

I didn't have to wait long for his reaction. "WHAT?" he shouted. "THAT LITTLE - " and something I won't repeat lest I offend any truckers or longshoremen. "HE'S DONE IT THIS TIME! I'LL SHOW HIM!"

Minutes later, the police arrived. A woman detective took me back to my room, so I could have some privacy as I gave my statement. When I was done, she said, "You don't need to worry about it anymore, miss. We've been in touch with campus police about this Williams character. If he tries anything else, the judge will put him under the jail."

Brian came to the house just as the police were leaving. Throwing a thumb in their direction, he asked, "What're they about?"

"Eric," I replied. "He sent me a sick and twisted birthday present."

"Delighted not to make his acquaintance. How are you holding up?"

"I've had the worst week. Angela punching me, my uncle slapping me, and now this."

"I guess you aren't really in the mood for the carnival?"

" I'm in the mood for whatever takes my mind off what just happened."
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Retribution

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Brian and I got to the carnival just as it was getting dark. Once he’d paid the admission fee, Brian led me inside. I’d been to the carnival many times over the years, but this year was different – I was here with a boy I really liked.

I was standing over by a set of tables when Brian came back with two things of cotton candy. Handing one to me, he said, “Penny for your thoughts?”

Taking a bite of the cotton candy, I said, “I’m just thinking about how last year when I came here, I was a boy in a wheelchair.” Looking at Brian, I said, “Now I’m here as a girl; alone with a boy.”

In an attempt to get my mind off Eric, Brian said, “So why don’t you tell me a little about the reunion?”

“It wasn’t really a reunion; it was a birthday party for my Nana.” Walking towards a few of the rides, I said, “Other than the dinner, I spent most of my time with my cousins Mackenzie and Rachel.”

“Rachel’s the one who used to be a boy, right?”

“Be glad she’s not here right now, she wouldn’t be happy to hear that.” Stopping in front of a ring toss booth, I said, “She was never really a boy; as far as she’s concerned, she’s always been a girl.”

“From the photos, you sent me, I never would have thought she was transgender.” Looking at me, Brian said, “I would’ve thought she was a girl like you.”

With a smile, I said, “There are no girls like me, Brian.”

*************************


Brian and I spent the next 45 minutes or so walking through the carnival. Eventually, I found myself carrying a large teddy bear that he’d won for me. We soon found ourselves standing in front of a haunted house. Looking at me, Brian said, “Do you want to try it?”

“I’m game if you are.” Chuckling, I said, “Unless you’re scared.”

“I’m not scared.” With a smirk, Brian said, “I was thinking you might be.”

“Whatever’s in there, I’m sure you’ll protect me.”

It was a few minutes before it was our turn to enter. As soon as we walked through the entrance, my heart started to race. I’d never been a fan of haunted houses. We were walking down a long hallway, as our eyes adjusted to the dim lighting when a knife-wielding monster jumped out at us. I’m not ashamed to admit that I screamed like a baby and grabbed onto Brian’s hand.

Wrapping an arm around me, holding me close to him, Brian said, “Its okay Cassidy, I’ll protect you.”

I started to feel safe in Brian’s embrace as we continued walking through the house. There were several more jump scares before we finally made it through. By the time we were finally outside, I was shaking like crazy.

Once we were far enough away from the haunted house, I stopped and turned to Brian. Looking at him, I said, “I can’t believe I let you take me through there!”

“It’s okay, we’re outside now.” Hugging me, he said, “There’s nothing that can scare you out here, babe.”

I immediately pulled away and looked at Brian. “What did you just call me?”

Realizing what he’d said, Brian began to blush. Looking at me, he said, “It was just a slip of the tongue.”

“A slip of the tongue would be if you accidentally called me Angela.” Looking at him, I said, “You called me babe on purpose.”

I knew Brian had backed himself into a metaphorical corner with no way out. After a few seconds on silence, he looked at me and said, “Okay fine, I did it on purpose.”

“What’s going on here?” pausing, I said, “I-I thought you wanted to take things slowly.”

“I did, at first.” Sighing, Brian said, “That was until I realized how much I cared about you.”

I hoped Brian was heading where I thought he was. Looking at him, I said, “What are you saying, Brian?”

Without saying a word, Brian leaned forward and kissed me. After getting over my initial shock, letting go of the bear, I wrapped my arms around his shoulders and returned the kiss.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The Carnival

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
When that first kiss ended, I took a selfie of us, then sent it to Kat, Mackenzie, and Rachel, with the caption: BF/GF! Thankfully, I had deleted Eric from my phone.

With that done, I asked, "So, where to now?"

"How 'bout the Tunnel of Love?"

"Sounds perfect."

When we were done waiting in line, the attendant took one look at us and seated us in the back of the boat. I remembered something I'd heard about riding the Tunnel of Love: Front seat for the scenery, back seat for hanky-panky.

Once we were in the dark, Brian and I fulfilled our end of that bargain. Kissing led to open-mouth kissing, which led to tongue kissing, which led to Brian feeling my breasts over my shirt. Luckily, the ride was constructed so we could quickly make ourselves presentable before too many people saw us.

With that, we agreed it was time to go home. Brian walked me to the door, then said, "I'll call you in the morning."

"Looking forward to it," I said, and we kissed again.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
When I woke up the next morning, my thoughts quickly went to last night at the carnival.

Grabbing my phone off the nightstand, I scrolled through the photos until I came across the one I was looking for - a photo of Brian and I kissing outside the Tunnel of Love that an attendant had taken.

I couldn't help but smile; even as I started to think whether things had moved too quickly. It's only been 2 weeks since my sudden sex change, and I already had a boyfriend.

Getting out of bed, I walked downstairs to find everyone sitting at the kitchen table. Looking up from her eggs, mom said, "You're in a good mood this morning."

"You would be too if you were me." Sitting down, pouring a glass of OJ, I said, "Brian kissed me last night; we're officially a couple."

Everyone was surprised to hear that; begging me for details. When I'd finished talking about last night, leaving out some details about the Tunnel of Love, Mom said, "I'm happy for you, sweetie."

"You don't think this is too quick?"

"Of course not." Looking at me, Mom said, "After you kissed him in the family room, I knew it wasn't going to be long before Brian and you got together."

Turning to Dad and Glenn, I said, "Are you guys okay with this?"

Dad looked at me and said, "I'm not 100% okay with it; but so long as you're happy, I'm fine with it."

"Thanks, daddy." Smiling, I said, "I can't say I ever imagined I'd be dating a boy, but Brian really does make me happy."

Looking at me, Glenn said, "If he ever hurts you..."

"I know." Looking at Glenn, I said, "You'll be there for me."
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The Next Morning

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
I was eating my breakfast, a short time later, when I heard the doorbell ring. With everyone else otherwise occupied, I went to see who it was.

Peeking out the window, I smiled when I saw Brian standing there. Opening the door, I embraced him and said, "Morning."

"Morning." Kissing me, he said, "How are you today?"

"Still on cloud nine after last night." Pulling him into the house, I said, "I can't believe we're dating."

"I had to pinch myself this morning to make sure I wasn't dreaming."

Just then Dad walked into the hallway, as Brian and I were kissing each other. "Good morning, Brian." With a stern tone, he said, "Can I speak to you for a moment?"

"Yes sir."

Brian followed dad down the hall to his office. I followed behind them but stopped when dad closed the door. Leaning against the door, I tried to listen to their conversation.

"I understand you're now dating my daughter."

"Y-Yes sir."

"You seem like a wonderful young man; especially showing concern after your ex assaulted Cassidy." Sighing, dad said, "I just want to make sure that you'll never do anything to harm my little girl."

I smiled when I heard; I think my dad was starting to come around to me being his daughter. Listening in again, I heard Brian say, "You have my word that I would never do anything to hurt Cassidy."

"That's good to hear." Pausing, dad said, "You're the only one outside our family, and the Maddox's next door, that knows about Cassidy's secret. I need to make sure that you'll never tell anyone."

"I promise that I'll take her secret to my grave."

"That's all I needed to hear."

I stepped back when I heard footsteps approaching; followed by dad opening the door. Looking at dad, I said, "Are you done interrogating my boyfriend?"

"Of course sweetheart." Smiling, Dad said, "I already knew he was a good guy; I just wanted to make absolutely sure."

Taking Brian's hand, I said, "I could have told you that he was good guy."
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Brian Visits

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
After his talk with my dad, Brian and I went to the family room. As we both sat on the couch, I said, "I didn't have anything major planned for today, so what do you want to do?"

"What do you say we just cuddle here on the couch and watch TV?"

Turning on the TV, I rested my head on Brian's shoulder. "I like the sound of that."

"I hope this isn't a sensitive subject; but were you ever involved with anyone before this?"

"There weren't a lot of girls who wanted to date a guy in a wheelchair." Looking at Brian, I said, "Kat was the closest I came to having a girlfriend. My unexpected sex change put a stop to that."

Kissing my forehead, Brian said, "I can't say I'm upset that it didn't work out between you two."

"Me neither." Smiling, I said, "Although sometimes I wonder how things would have been different had I stayed a guy."

************


Brian and I were watching the end of one of the Star Wars movies, a short time later, when there was a knock at the door. Mom walked over to answer it. "Hello Kat."

"Hi Mrs. S, is Cassidy home?"

"She's watching a movie in the living room with Brian."

Kat walked into the room and saw me cuddling with Brian. "What's all this then?" Confused, she said, "Is there something I should know about?"

"Didn't you see my text from last night?" Sitting up, I said, "Brian and I are dating now."

"My phone died yesterday afternoon, I didn't see any text messages."

"Well now you know."

"Anyway, I came over because my dad told me about what happened with Eric; I wanted to see if you were okay."

"I was shocked last night, but now I'm better."

"That's good." Smiling, Kat said, "Hey, do you guys want to come over and use my pool?"

"Sure, that sounds fun."
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Brian was able to borrow a bathing suit from Glenn; after which the three of us went over to Kat's house. I got a few questions from Kat's parents about Brian, but they were supportive.

After using the bathroom, I walked outside to find the others already in the water. Seeing me in the bikini, Brian said, "Wow, you look even better in person."

"Thanks."

"We've already paired off for a game of chicken." Looking at me, Kat said, "It'll be Brian and you versus Glenn and me."

"That sounds like fun."

**************


We played 5 games of chicken, with Brian and I winning 3 of them. While Brian and I sat by the pool, Kat and Glenn went inside the house.

Looking at me, Brian said, "Glenn says he's okay; but I still think he's freaked out by us dating."

"I think part of him still sees me as his older brother." Pausing, I said, "It's weird for him to see me dating a guy."

"Hopefully he comes to terms with it soon."

"I hope so." Getting up, I said, "I'll be right back, I have to use the bathroom."

Walking into the house, I was surprised when I didn't see Glenn or Kat around. Pushing those thoughts aside, I made my way to the bathroom.

Arriving outside the bathroom, I thought I heard voices coming from inside. Opening the door, I was surprised by what I saw - Kat, leaning against the counter, making out with Glenn.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: At the Pool

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"What the hell?"

Kat looked at me first. "Oh, hi, Cass. I figured it was okay, since - "

But I ignored her and spun Glenn around. "What do you think you're doing?"

"Well," he replied, "I think I was kissing a girl. Suppose you tell me what you think I was doing?"

"Don't try to get cute, Glenn. You know Kat's my best friend. Her folks asked me to protect her."

"And what? I'm supposed to be somebody she needs protection from?"

"You said it, I didn't."

"This is ridiculous. I trust you to take care of yourself with Brian. Why - "

"Leave Brian out of this. This isn't about him."

"Well, I'd sure love to know what this is about!"

"Knock it off, the both of you!" Kat yelled.

That brought us both up short.

"I will date who I feel like! And if that person is Glenn, then, by God, I'm dating Glenn! Is! That! Clear!"
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: The Dispute Begins

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Turning to Kat, I said, "You really want to date my brother?"

"Yes, I do; he's a great guy." Looking at me, Kat said, "Do I wish I could still be dating you? Of course I do."

I expected Glenn to be insulted by that, but instead he said, "Cass, you should know we didn't just start this for the hell of it."

"What are you saying?" Looking at them both, I said, "You guys actually like each other?"

"It didn't start out that way; but yes, we actually like each other." Looking at me, Kat said, "We started talking a few days before your birthday, to see if we could help each other cope with your change."

"If you have a problem with this, Cass, then we'll stop." Taking Kat's hand, Glenn said, "But I do care for Kat, and I hope you'll be okay with that."

Before I could respond, Brian walked into the bathroom. "I was beginning to think you guys weren't coming back." Seeing Glenn and Kat holding hands, he said, "What's going on here?"

Turning to Brian, I said, "It seems that my best friend and my brother are a couple now."

"That's awesome!" Smiling, Glenn said, "Maybe the 4 of us can go out on a double date or something."

I wasn't too sure about that, but I didn't want to have a fight with Brian yet. Looking at him, I said, "I guess we can do that, if you really want to."

Turning to Glenn and Kat, Brian said, "What do you guys say?"

"We would love to."
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: An Explanation

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
After learning that Glenn and Kat were involved, I suddenly lost interest in relaxing by the pool. Maybe it was the thought of my brother and my best friend together, or maybe it was the notion that Kat didn’t talk to me beforehand.

I was back in my room, having just changed back into my clothes when Brian came walking in. Looking at me, he said, “Are you okay? You left in kind of a hurry.”

“No Brian, I’m not okay.” Looking at him, I said, “Nothing about this situation is okay.”

“What situation are we talking about?”

“My brother is dating my best friend.”

“What’s the big deal if they’re dating?”

“It’s just weird.” Sighing, I said, “Why couldn’t my brother find someone else to date?”

“I think I know why you’re so upset about this.” Sitting on the bed, Brian said, “Didn’t you say that Kat and you were involved?”

“That was for like 2 days; before I became a girl.” Turning to him, I said, “If you think I’m jealous, then you’re way off base.”

“Then what's got you so upset?” looking at me, Brian said, “I’m trying to be the supportive boyfriend, but you need to give me something.”

“It’s just...Kat never talked to me about this.” Sitting on the bed, I said, “Instead I have to find out when I walk in on them making out in the bathroom.”

“Why don’t you go talk to Kat about this?”

I wanted to say that Brian’s idea was stupid, but deep down I knew he was right. “I guess you’re right; I probably should go talk with her.” Leaning against him, I said, “You know, you’re pretty smart.”

Chuckling, Brian said, “I’m more than just a pretty face.”

“I’m really lucky to have such a supportive boyfriend.”

“I’m really lucky to have such an amazing girlfriend.”

Leaning forward, I started kissing Brian. It wasn’t long before we were making out on my bed.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A Bedroom Chat

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
As Brian nibbled on my ear, he said, "You know, I'm not the only one who thinks I'm lucky."

"Oh, yeah?"

"I showed a couple of my friends your picture, and their immediate reaction was "She got a sister?"

I giggled as I reached under his shirt to rub his chest. "How heartbroken were they when you said no?"

"They were crushed. But I saved the day when I showed them the pictures of you and your cousins. Now, they want me to ask you where they can find them."

"Well, then I have good news. They'll be going to our school. And Rachel will be overjoyed to hear she's got someone who's interested in her."

I started to take off my top when Brian said, "I think we should stop."

I groaned. "Give me one good reason."

"Well , your folks are okay with me dating their daughter, but they might not be so happy with me deflowering her under their roof."
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
With great reluctance, I agreed to break off our little hanky-panky session. "I really want to sleep with you, though," I said.

Brian chuckled. "What would you have said, if somebody told you a month ago that you would say that?"

I looked down. "Probably the same thing you would have said, if somebody told you you'd be that happy with the prospect of sleeping with me."

*********************************


Supper time rolled around, and the family sat down to eat. "I had an interesting phone call," Mom said. "Apparently, Eric has pled guilty, and, in exchange, the police have let him go for some sort of 'alternative punishment,' as the detective put it."

"Sounds disgusting," Daddy responded. "He traumatizes young girls, and he gets out of jail for what? Probably something like horseback riding and organic diet, or some such."

"The detective didn't have all the details," Mom went on. "But she did say she didn't think Eric would be bothering any more girls."
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
That night, I was just about ready for bed when I realized I had to go to the bathroom. Peeing as a girl was second nature to me by this time, so I thought nothing of it as I toddled off to the bathroom, dropped my panties, and sat down.

Or, rather, splashed down. Glenn had forgotten to put the seat down when he was done.

After figuring that out, I tried to pull myself up, only to find myself stuck. "GLENN!"

He came running. "What's going - ", he began, but he stopped talking and covered his eyes when he saw the predicament I was in.

By now, I was out of patience. "Up when you pee, down when you're done. How difficult is that to remember?"

"Well, why didn't you look before you sat down?"

I was halfway through questioning his true parentage when Mom came in. "What's going on?"

"This idiot left the seat up," I replied, "and now I'm stuck! That's what's going on!"

"Alright." She bent down in front of me. "Wrap your arms around my neck, Cassidy."

When I did that, she said, "Now, pull."

As I pulled, she straightened up. Together, we extricated me with a pop!

After that, Mom helped me clean myself up, and I went to bed, cursing Glenn's existence the whole time.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Arguments Begin

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
It was two days before I got the courage to go speak with Kat. It was the day before we started school again, and I didn’t want to start school without her support. I’d just gotten back from helping to move Rachel, Mackenzie, and their mom into their new house a few blocks away.

After getting out of the car, while Glenn helped Dad bring some tools to the garage, I walked over to Kat’s house. It wasn’t long before Kat answered the door, although she looked disappointed to see me. “Oh…Cass, it’s you.”

I let my annoyance seep through as I looked at her. “Let me guess, you were hoping it was Glenn.”

“So what if I was?” stepping outside, Kat said, “Do you have a problem with me wanting to see my boyfriend?”

“Don’t call him that.” Looking at her, I said, “You haven’t even been out on a date yet.”

“Neither have you and Brian.” Getting defensive, Kat said, “But that didn’t stop you from calling him your boyfriend after one kiss at the carnival.”

I was getting tired of having my relationship with Brian brought up in a negative light. Looking at Kat, I said, “Oh please, what Brian and I have is genuine.” Scoffing, I said, “You just hooked up with Glenn because you were jealous.”

“Jealous?” incredulous, Kat said, “What could I possibly be jealous of?”

“How about that I got a boyfriend before you?” looking at her, I said, “You can’t stand the thought that a former boy got a boyfriend before you.”

That was enough for Kat to lunge at me. Pulling on my hair, it wasn’t long before the two of us were fighting. Kat managed to get a few good scratches in, while I gave her a black eye. Before we got too far, Mrs. Maddox came running out of the house. Separating us, she said, “Get inside now!”
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Kat and I Talk

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"I cannot believe what I just saw," Mrs. Maddox said, as soon as we were inside. "You two have been friends for as long as Kat's been alive. What could possibly be so important that it's worth the two of you being at each other's throats?"

"I'm going with Glenn," Kat replied, "and Cassidy flipped out over it."

I snorted. "Way to leave out how you deliberately hid it from me. If it's as innocent as you claim, why did you let me find out by walking in on the two of you swapping spit?"

"We didn't tell you because... Well, because you're what brought us together. Glenn missed his brother, I missed the boy who could have been my boyfriend, we talked, and something happened between us."

"You make it sound like I died. And like I'm the one who did it." I turned to Mrs. Maddox. "You asked me to protect Kat. How am I supposed to do that when she's sneaking around?"

"Well, gee, Cass, did you think to ask me if I think I need protection? 'Cause I would have spelled it out for you."

"Alright," Mrs. Maddox said. "We've all made mistakes here. Kat, I asked Cassidy to look out for you because of what happened with Eric. I felt guilty that that happened on my watch, and I didn't want for it to happen again. And you should have been more forthcoming, young lady. Friends don't keep secrets from each other. And it's not fair to blame Cassidy for something that she didn't do and had no control over. Cassidy, while I did ask you to keep an eye on Kat, I didn't ask you to try and break them up if she found someone.

"Now, I can't ask you to pretend like this never happened, but I can ask that you try to move past it. High school is tough enough, there's no sense making it tougher by trying to go it without your best friend. Do you think you can try?"

Under her breath, and almost without moving her lips, Kat said, "I suppose I could give it a try."

"I guess," I added, the same way.

"Good. Now, how about you shake on it?"

We shook hands almost robotically. The whole time we shook hands, I was thinking, Just wait until the first time she asks Glenn for sympathy during her period.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A Lecture

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
It’s been almost a week since Kat and I had our fight; other than her coming over to see Glenn, I hadn’t seen her much. But I couldn’t dwell on that now – today was the first day of school.

After turning off my alarm clock, I got out of bed and went down the hall. Last night Glenn and I agreed that I’d be the first one to use the bathroom since my morning routine was more complicated than his. So you can imagine my surprise when I saw the door closed and could hear the shower going inside the bathroom.

“Glenn!” banging on the door, I said, “We agreed I would be the first in the shower!”

Mom came running out of her bedroom, dad had already left for work. Looking at me, she said, “What’s going on?”

“Glenn and I agreed that I’d be the first in the shower.” Gesturing towards the door, I said, “That jerk went back on his promise.”

Without saying a word to me, Mom opened the door and walked inside. She must’ve caught Glenn as he was coming out of the shower because I heard him yell, “What the hell, Mom!”

I peeked inside as Mom stood in front of Glenn. “You and your sister agreed that she would be the first in the shower.” Pausing, Mom said, “Would you mind telling me why you broke that agreement?”

“I don’t see what the big deal is.” Scoffing, Glenn said, “Marcus and I never had to fight over the shower.”

“Marcus and you were both boys.” Gesturing to me, Mom said, “Your sister has more to do in the morning to get ready.”

“Whatever.” Walking past mom, glaring at me, Glenn said, “The showers free, your majesty.”

I had to restrain myself from punching Glenn. But with him out of the bathroom, it was my turn to get ready.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: First Day of School

11112.content:
I went to bed without any complications, so you can imagine my confusion when I woke up to discover a breathing tube down my throat. I started to panic, which caused alarms to start going off around me. It wasn’t long before a nurse came running into the room. Turning off the alarms, she turned her attention to me. “Calm down, Marcus, everything is alright.”

Like hell it is; I have a breathing tube down my throat. Also – why does my chest feel weird?

Another minute went by as Mom and Dad came into the room, with an unfamiliar doctor. I was still feeling a little panicky, but I was starting to calm down. Walking over to the bed, taking my hand in hers, Mom said, “Sweetie, calm down, everything’s going to be alright.”

“We’re going to remove the breathing tube now, Marcus.” Looking at me, the doctor said, “You may feel some discomfort, but that’s normal.”

Some discomfort was an understatement; it felt as if my throat was on fire. Once the tube was removed, my voice raspy, I said, “What happened?”

“There was a complication a few hours after we had dinner.” Glancing at Mom, Dad said, “Marcus, you’ve been in a medically induced coma for the last 10 days.”

“What kind of complication?” My voice started coming back, but it sounded higher than normal. “What’s wrong with my voice?”

“That’s part of the complication, honey.” Taking a deep breath, Mom said, “There was an... unforeseen side effect to the procedure.”

“What kind of side effect?” concerned, I said, “Please tell me I’m not completely paralyzed.”

“No, sweetie, it’s not that.” Taking a mirror from her purse, Mom handed it to me and said, “It’s probably better to show you.”

Bringing the mirror up to my face, I was shocked by what I saw looking back at me. Actually, shocked doesn’t come close to how I felt. Looking back at me was the smooth, feminine face of a young girl.
11112.title: A Complication

111121.content:
The nurses had to give me a sedative to calm me down after I saw my reflection in the mirror. I was feeling rather drowsy, but I was still aware of everything around me. Once the doctor and the nurses left the room, I turned to Mom and Dad. “What the hell happened? Why am I a girl!?”

“We don’t know, Marcus.” Looking at me, Mom said, “All they told us is that it was an unforeseen reaction to the injections.”

“This is a pretty serious unforeseen side effect!” Gesturing to my chest, I said, “I’ve got breasts, for God’s sake!”

“Calm down, Marcus.” Walking over, Dad said, “Everything is going to be alright.”

“Don’t tell me to calm down, Dad!” Getting angry, I said, “I’ve been turned into a girl, I have every right to be upset!”

“Kent, can you give Marcus and me some privacy?”

Dad silently walked out of the room. Once the door was closed, I said, “I’m scared, Mom.”

“I know you are, sweetie.” Sitting next to me in bed, Mom said, “But we’ll get through this, just like we did after the accident.”

The two of us sat there in bed for a few moments; until I was able to calm down a little. Once I was calm enough, I turned to her and said, “Could I, uh, check out the rest of my body?”

“Of course, honey.”

With some help from Mom, I managed to get to the bathroom. As Mom stood in the doorway, I said, “Can I have some privacy, Mom?”

“Sure thing, Marcus; I’ll be outside if you need anything.”

Closing the door, I slowly walked towards the sink. I was so focused on turning into a girl, it barely registered that I was walking for the first time in almost 5 years. Using the sink for support, I looked at my face. If I looked real close, I could still see some of my old self in there; but there was really nothing left to show that I’d ever been a boy. The light brown hair I typically left in a buzz cut was now darker brown and down to my shoulders.

I hesitated when it came to the next step – I wasn’t sure I was ready to take it. After a moment, I decided to take off my hospital gown. I was shocked, to say the least, by what I saw; I now had breasts and a modest but still noticeable figure. I didn’t yet have the courage to look further, but I could sense something different between my legs.

I stood in front of the mirror for what seemed like an eternity; until I decided I’d spent enough time. After getting the hospital gown back on, I slowly walked towards the door; my legs feeling like they were going to give out. Once I opened the door, Mom saw me struggling to stay standing. “Here sweetie, let me help you to the bed.”

“Thanks, Mom.”

Once I was back in the bed, Mom said, “Both Kat and your brother have been asking to see you.” Pausing, Mom said, “Who do you want to see first?”
111121.title: Continue

1111211.content:
I wasn’t really in the mood to see anyone at the moment, but I knew Mom wouldn’t take no for an answer. I figured Kat would be the safest bet, since she probably wouldn’t tease me as much as Glenn. With a heavy sigh, I looked at Mom and said, “I’ll see Kat first.”

Mom silently walked out the door, leaving me alone for a few moments. I watched as Kat walked into the room, stopping just inside the door when she saw me lying in bed. I wasn’t sure what to say to her, so I simply waved at her and said, “Hi.”

Kat suddenly ran over and, before I could react, hugged me tightly. That was definitely a new experience for me, as the hug squeezed our breasts together. After hugging me for a moment, she looked at me and said, “I was so worried about you.” Pausing, she said, “I’m glad you’re okay.”

“I’m also glad I’m okay.” Gesturing to my new body, I said, “Although I do wish I didn’t have to turn into a girl.”

“If you had to be a girl, at least you’re an attractive one.”

I was surprised to hear Kat say that, as I was fairly certain she liked boys. Looking at her, I said, “You think I’m attractive?”

“Not in a sexual way, no.” smiling, Kat said, “Let’s just say, if I were a lesbian, I’d be all over you.”

Once again, I was surprised by what Kat said. Until all this happened, I never thought about whether she had those kinds of thoughts. Then again, until 10 days ago, I didn’t know she had feelings for me. Wanting to change the subject, I said, “Did I miss anything over the last 10 days?”

“Not really; honestly, I spent most of my free time here.” Looking at me, turning serious, Kat said, “I, uh, was really worried about you Marcus. No one would tell me what was going on; it wasn’t until a few days ago that your folks finally told me what happened.”

“I’m sorry for putting you through that.”

“Hey it’s not your fault; it’s not like you planned to turn into a girl.” With a grin, Kat said, “I will say though, I’m getting used to the idea of having a close girlfriend my age living next door.”

I hadn’t thought of that; with Kat and me the same age now, she would be able to help me cope in ways Mom couldn’t. Looking at her, I said, “I get the feeling I’m going to be coming to you with a lot of questions over the next few weeks.”

“You taught me how to ride my bike.” Looking at me, Kat said, “Teaching you how to be a girl is the least I could do.”

We continued talking for a few minutes, until Mom came in and said Kat’s parents were here to pick her up. Before Kat turned to leave, I said, “I know nothing can come of it now, but perhaps, after I get out of the hospital, we could finish talking about that kiss you gave me?”

“Sure.”
1111211.title: Talking With Kat

11112111.content:
Glenn came in a few minutes later, although he didn’t go any further than the door. Is he afraid I’ll bite or something? “Glenn, don’t just stand there.”

Glenn slowly took a few steps towards me, closing the door as he went. Standing next to me, he said, “H-How do you feel?”

“I’m feeling pretty well, actually.” With a smirk, I continued, “Although I’m pretty sure that’s the sedatives they have me on.”

“Mom and Dad wouldn’t let me see you at all. I guess they were worried that I wouldn’t react very well.”

“I can’t say I blame them.” Sighing, I said, “It’s not every day your older brother turns into your younger sister.”

“Younger sister?”

“Of course, stupid.” Groaning, I said, “I’m younger than you, and I’m your sister.”

After thinking that over for a few seconds, Glenn chuckled and said, “I guess you’re right.” Looking at me, he said, “So, is it weird,... being a girl?”

“I don’t know yet; I’ve only been awake for 45 minutes or so.” Sighing, I said, “I can tell you one thing – these breasts are going to get some getting used to."

I noticed Glenn glance downward at my chest before catching himself. “I guess I’ll take your word for it.”

“Can we talk about something else, other than my sex change?” pausing, I said, “I’ve been in a coma for almost 2 weeks; catch me up on what I’ve missed.”

Glenn proceeded to catch me up on everything I’d missed – including some details about my change in gender. Apparently, some hot-headed intern knew that the serum had a chance of causing sex changes in the lab rats. “Dad nearly broke Dr. Wilcox’s nose when he told us.” Sighing, Glenn said, “The police arrested the intern; the lab is looking into the situation on our behalf.”

“Have Mom and Dad told the... Glenn, please stop staring at my chest!”

I’d noticed, for the last minute or so, Glenn’s eyes venturing down towards my chest again. I was starting to get a little uncomfortable – he was my brother, after all, and he couldn’t stop looking at my breasts. “Sorry.” Looking up at me, blushing, Glenn said, “I just never imagined you’d be such a looker.”

I couldn’t believe what I’d just heard. Looking at Glenn, trying to contain my anger, I said, “Excuse me?”

“I’m just saying, you make a great looking girl.”

“Hey idiot, you’re my brother; please stop talking about me like that.” With an angry sigh, I said, “You know what, just get out.”

“Marcus, I’m...”

“I said GET OUT!!”

Glenn silently turned to leave, while I turned to look away from him. Being a girl was bad enough, I didn’t need my brother thinking about me that way.

****************************


I wasn’t sure how much time had passed since Glenn left. I was lying in bed, looking out the window, when I heard a knock at the door. Before I could respond, I heard the door open. “Glenn, so help me, if you...”

I stopped talking when I saw Mom standing in the doorway. “It’s just me, sweetie; your dad and Glenn went home.” Closing the door, Mom walked over to me and said, “I thought you might like some company.”
11112111.title: Glenn Pays A Visit

111121111.content:
Mom and I spent the next hour or so together, although the two of us in one bed meant there wasn’t a lot of wiggle room. It reminded me of the first few weeks after my accident, when I’d been depressed with everything that happened. I wouldn’t say that I was ever suicidal back then, but there were times that I wondered if I was going to make it through.

One of the nurses had just come into the room to take our dinner orders. Mom ordered a burger and fries for each of us. After the nurse left, I moved around in the bed until my head was resting on Mom’s chest.

I was only half paying attention to the TV, which was showing some 90’s action movie, when I felt Mom’s hand running through my hair. Looking up at her, I said, “What are you doing?”

“I’m just admiring your hair. It's the same color and texture as when I was your age.” Running another hand through my hair, she continued, “Once we get out of the hospital, I’ll show you how to take care of it.”

“If you don’t mind my asking, Mom, why do you seem so blasé about all this?” pausing, I said, “Dad’s barely said one word to me since I came out of the coma, and Glenn couldn’t stop looking at my breasts. But you don’t seem to really care.”

“I was angry for a while; but then I realized that, if you came out of the coma, you would need my support.”

“What about Dad?”

“Let’s just say this has caused a rift between me and your father.” Sighing, Mom said, “He blames me for what happened, because I insisted that you take part in such an experimental procedure.”

“That explains why he’s not talking to you, but why’s he ignoring me?”

“He’s unsure how to handle this situation.” Pausing, Mom said, “Don’t you remember, he was the same way after your accident.”

I remembered Dad practically walking on eggshells around me for the first month after my accident. Looking at Mom, I said, “Do you think he’ll ever come around?”

“I’m sure he will.” Leaning over, Mom kissed me on the forehead and said, “But don’t you worry about that now; you just worry about getting better.”

“Thanks, Mom.”
111121111.title: Time With Mom

1111211111.content:
I spent most of the night trying to stay asleep; but no matter what positions I tried, I couldn’t get comfortable. It didn’t take me long to figure out it was my new breasts. After waking up for the 4th time, around 4:30 in the morning, I finally gave up.

Sitting up in bed, to no one in particular, I said, “Stupid breasts keep getting in the way. How do girls sleep with these things?”

“Give it time, honey; I’m sure you’ll get used to it.”

Turning towards the voice, I saw Mom sitting in one of the nearby chairs. I hadn’t realized she was there until she spoke up. “I don’t want to get used to them, Mom.” Frustrated, I said, “I’m not supposed to even have them.”

“Well, you have them now, honey.” Walking over to the bed, Mom said, “Unfortunately you followed in my footsteps; every woman on my side of the family has large breasts.”

I hadn’t realized until then just how big my breasts were; they weren’t huge, but they certainly weren’t small either. “This whole situation is really screwed up, Mom.” Sighing, awkwardly putting my arms against my chest, I said, “I came here thinking I’d be leaving as a 14-year-old boy; not as some girl whose brother thinks is a looker.”

“Excuse me?”

Seeing the shocked look on Mom’s face, I explained, “When Glenn came to see me this afternoon after I woke up, he wouldn’t stop staring at my chest.” Taking a breath, I continued, “When I called him out on it, he said he never imagined I’d be such a looker.”

“Your father and I will need to have a talk with your brother then.” Placing a hand on my shoulder, Mom said, “In the meantime, try to get some rest; you have a busy day coming up.”

“What? Why?”

“The lawyers are insisting that you are given a complete physical.” Looking at me, Mom said, “Which, unfortunately for you, means a breast and vaginal exam.”

I went pale when I heard that. “Great, now I’m going to have nightmares.”
1111211111.title: During the Night

11112111111.content:
I ended up not getting much sleep after talking with Mom, but that wasn’t for lack of trying. It was 7:30 by the time I gave up. I was lying in bed, watching some early morning cartoons, when Mom walked into the room. “Good morning, sweetie.”

“What’s so good about it?”

“Judging from the attitude, I’m guessing you didn’t get any more sleep?”

“No, I didn’t.” sighing, I said, “How do you handle it?”

Realizing what I was referring to, Mom said, “I sleep on my back; it does wonders.”

I never really liked sleeping on my back; I’d always preferred sleeping on my stomach. But I couldn’t do that any more, thanks to the new additions to my chest. “I suppose I could try that.” Taking a breath, wanting to change the subject, I said, “What time is my physical?”

“It’s not for another 20 minutes or so.” Looking at me, Mom said, “Your Dad and brother wanted to check in on you.”

I wasn’t in the mood for Glenn’s non-discreet stares at my chest, but I did appreciate the fact that he wanted to check up on me.
“Fine, they can come in; but so long as Glenn doesn’t stare at my breasts the entire time.”

Mom silently went outside to bring Dad and Glenn into the room. She stood in the doorway as they came next to the bed. The first one to speak was Glenn. “How’d you sleep last night, Marcus?”

“Terribly.” Sighing, I said, “These breasts kept getting in the way.”

“I can see why.” Glancing at them, Glenn said, “They’re huge!”

Before I could respond, Dad smacked Glenn on the back of his head. “That was inappropriate, Glenn; that’s your...sister.”
Looking at me, wincing, Glenn said, “Sorry, Marcus.”

“It’s alright.” Turning to Dad, I said, “Thanks for smacking some sense into him, Dad.”

“No problem...son.” pausing, Dad said, “I want you to know that whoever’s responsible for this will pay.”

“Thanks, Dad.”

Having briefly stepped out of the room, Mom walked back in and said, “Marcus, honey, the nurse is here to get you for the physical.”

“Thanks, Mom.”

Mom turned to face Dad, and saw an annoyed look on his face. “Would you stop looking at me like that, Kent?”

“None of this would have happened if you’d listened to me, Gloria.” Gesturing to me, Dad said, “Marcus would still be a boy if you hadn’t been so focused on him getting the serum.”

Glenn and I could only watch in silence as Mom and Dad started arguing. “You think I wanted this to happen?” pausing, Mom said, “How could anyone have known something like this would happen?”

After this went on for a few minutes, I’d finally had enough. “Would you guys please stop fighting!” sighing, I said, “Both of you are forgetting the big picture here – that I’m walking again for the first time in almost 5 years.”

“That’s all well and good, Marcus.” Looking at me, Dad said, “But wouldn’t you rather be a boy?”

“I’d become a baby again, if it meant being able to walk again.” Pausing, I said, “Sure, it kind of sucks that I'm a girl now; but I’m just glad I can walk again. I’ll come to terms with everything else in time.”

After staying silent for a few moments, Dad said, “I suppose I should talk with our lawyer.” Sighing, Dad said, “We’ll need to make a new identity for you.”
11112111111.title: The Next Morning

111121111111.content:
I’d hoped, after the procedure, that I would never have to sit in a wheelchair again. That hope was shattered when I saw the nurse wheel one into my room. She must’ve seen the look on my face, because she smiled and said, “It's hospital policy, Marcus.” Looking at me, she said, “Besides, your legs need time to get stronger.”

Sighing, I hopped off the bed and sat in the wheelchair. “I guess you’re right.”

Mom walked next to me as the nurse led us to the exam room. Looking at me, she said, “Do you have any questions about the exam, sweetie?”

“Not really.” Scoffing, I said, “I’ve had physicals before.”

As we waited for the elevator, Mom said, “I’m afraid they’re a little different for girls, sweetie.” Pausing, Mom said, “Sure, there’s going to be some similarities, but there’s also going to be some aspects you aren’t familiar with.”

I was started to get a little nervous; wondering what I was getting myself into. As the elevator door opened, I said, “What do you mean exactly?”

“The doctor is going to take some measurements so we can get you clothes that fit.” Looking at me, Mom said, “There’s also going to be a breast exam and a vaginal exam.”

I’d watched enough medical shows to know what a vaginal exam was. I went pale when I realized I was going to have to experience one. Looking at Mom, I said, “A doctor is going to touch my...vagina?”

“It’s nothing to worry about, Marcus.” Looking down at me, the nurse said, “They’re something every woman has to go through.”

“That’s easy for you to say.” Pausing, as the elevator doors opened, I said, “You didn’t use to be a guy.”

*************************


I soon found myself situated on an exam table, my feet resting in some stirrups. I couldn’t help but feel very exposed. Mom was doing her best to comfort me, but there wasn’t much she could do. It wasn’t long before the doctor, a woman in her late 30s, walked into the room.

“Hello, I’m Dr. Card.” Closing the door, she said, “You must be Marcus.”

“That’s right, Doc.” Sighing, I said, “Look, can we skip the small talk and just get this over with?”

Thankfully, both Mom and Dr. Card were kind enough to let my attitude slide. Pulling a chair up to the table, Dr. Card said, “Now, I know this is an entirely new experience for you, so I’ll be happy to answer any questions you might have?”

“I do have one question.” Taking a breath, I said, “What exactly can you learn from something like this?”

“Most of the time, it’s a simple check to make sure everything is in good condition. We also use it to check for signs of cervical cancer.” Grabbing some gloves, Dr. Card said, “In your situation, I suspect we’ll also be able to determine when you can expect your first period.”

The hits just keep on coming; it hadn’t occurred to me that I was going to have periods now. Looking at Dr. Card, I said, “I’ll admit, that’s something I never expected to hear.”

“I never expected to have to say it to a... young woman in your position.” Pausing, Dr. Card said, “Now, I’m going to start the exam now; you may feel a little discomfort, but that’s normal. If you want me to stop, at any time, just say so.”

*************************


The exam itself, while disturbing and uncomfortable, wasn’t as bad as I’d expected. Dr. Card clearly had experience in this area, because it was obvious she knew what she was doing. Once she was finished, she looked at Mom and me. “Well, Marcus, you may be happy to hear that you’re a perfectly healthy teenage girl.” Pausing, she said, “Judging by what I saw, I suspect you’ll probably have your first period sometime in the next few days.”

“I suppose I should be grateful that I’m healthy.” Looking at her, I said, “Thanks, Dr. Card.”

“You’re welcome, Marcus.” Looking at me, she said, “Now, before you go, I have to give you a breast exam; and your mother said she wants measurements for clothes.”

The breast exam mainly consisted of Dr. Card squeezing my boobs like she was kneading dough. "Is this completely necessary?" I asked.

"This is just a precaution," she replied. "In later years, you'll get to experience mammograms."

"What are they like?"

"We put your breast on a metal platform, then we press it with another metal slab."

I shivered. "And I thought the speculum was bad."

With the breast exam out of the way, Dr. Card began measuring me. She wrapped a tape measure around my rib cage, just below my breasts. "38," she said. Then, she wrapped the same tape measure around my breasts. "D."

"D? Don't you mean C?"

She shook her head. "D. And, at your age, you're not done filling out yet."

38D, and sure to get bigger. Glenn will never take his eyes off of me.
111121111111.title: The Physical

1111211111111.content:
Once the examination was finished, Mom and I waited for the nurse to come back for us. As we waited, Mom looked at me and said, "Once you're back in your room, I'm going to go clothes shopping for you."

"Please don't go overboard, Mom," I said. "I know I'm a girl now, but I'm not sure I'm up for wearing anything too girly."

"I'll just get the necessities for now: a couple bras and some underwear." Smiling , Mom said, "Perhaps I'll even get you something to wear once we leave the hospital."

It wasn't long before the nurse came back in with the wheelchair; only, this time, she was also holding what looked to be a leg brace. Looking at her, I asked, "What's with the leg brace?"

"You're being moved up to the Pediatric floor, since there's no need for you to remain in the ICU," she said. "The leg brace is just part of the cover story your folks came up with."

"It's just a precaution," Mom explained, "in case someone asks why you're in the hospital. Just tell them you tore your ACL playing basketball."

As the nurse went to work putting the brace around my leg, I said, "I suppose this is better than telling the truth." Looking at Mom, I asked, "I'm not going to have to wear this at school, am I?"

"Your father and I are meeting with the school tomorrow." Sighing , Mom added, "It's not ideal, but we think the best course of action is to tell them what happened. You'll still be returning there as a freshman, only now, you'll be a girl."

******************************


The ride up to the Pediatric floor was uneventful. As we got out of the elevator, I was surprised to see it hadn't changed much in the years since the last time I'd been in here. Having spent almost a month in here following the accident, I was pretty familiar with the place.

As the nurse wheeled me past the playroom, which consisted mainly of a TV, an air hockey table, and board games, I saw a boy about my age sitting on the couch with another girl. Judging by her appearance, I figured she must’ve been his older sister or something. I saw he had on one of those boots you wore when you broke your foot.

The nurse left after getting me situated in my new room. Once she left, Mom turned to me and said, “Are you feeling up for some visitors?”

“That depends.” Curious, I said, “Who is it?”
1111211111111.title: Post Examination

11112111111111.content:
“It’s just a few girls from the cheer squad.” Looking at me, Mom said, “They’ve been asking to see you for the last few days.”

You’re probably wondering why I, a somewhat scrawny boy, was being visited by three members of the High School cheerleading squad. Well, it’s pretty straight forward. I used to play a lot of sports before the accident; basketball mostly, but I did do some running. Anyway, after the accident, I was trying to figure out what I could do now that I couldn’t actively participate in sports.

That was until the cheerleading coach saw my camera work during a segment of the school news. Long story short, she asked if I’d like to record the squad’s routines for them. I would occasionally help carry some equipment onto the field, but mostly I just recorded them. At first they thought it was weird that I was willing to spend so much time with them, but eventually, they accepted me as an honorary member of the squad.

“Who from the squad is here?”

Looking at me, Mom said, “It’s just Morgan, Michelle, and Amber.”

Morgan, Michelle, and Amber were going to be sophomores this year. The three of them had grown up together; with Morgan being the leader of the group. She was around the same height I was now; with blonde hair. I was the only one outside the squad to know that she used falsies – otherwise, she was rather flat-chested.

Michelle was the shortest of the 3, but also the oldest by a month. She could be kind of ditzy at times. I always got the feeling that if she just asserted herself more, than she would be better off. But instead, she just followed Morgan around.

Amber was the one I was closest to out of the 3 of them. I honestly don’t know why she hangs out with Morgan.

Looking at Mom, I said, “How did they even find out I was in the hospital?”

“I ran into Morgan’s mother at the grocery store last week.” Pausing, Mom said, “I mentioned how you were in the hospital. The next day Morgan and a few others came to the house asking if they could come to visit you.”

“Do they know that I’m a girl now?”

“They know there was a complication, but they don’t know exactly what happened.” Taking a breath, Mom said, “If you want, I can ask them to come back later.”

“No, it’s alright.” Sighing, I said, “Besides; I’m going to need all the help I can get adjusting to all of this.”

Mom then stepped out of the room. The girls must’ve been waiting close by because I could hear Mom talking to them. “Marcus said you girls can go in, but you should know his appearance is going to be shocking.”

I heard Amber, one of the squadmates, respond, “Don’t worry, Mrs. Scott; we can handle it.”

I don’t think you’re ready for this, Amber. I lay on the bed as the trio of girls walked into the room; carrying what looked to be a get well card and a bear. “Hey Marcus, glad to...”

Morgan, the leader of the trio, stopped mid-sentence when she saw me lying on the bed. The other two, Amber and Michelle, did the same. Seeing the confused looks on their faces, I said, “Hey guys.”

Michelle, the first to find her voice, looked at me and said, “This is a joke, right?” pausing, she said, “You’re not Marcus.”

“Believe me, I wish this was a joke.” Sighing, I said, “But it’s real – I’m a girl now.”

In order to convince them, I had to tell them something only I would know. Once they were convinced, they looked at me in shock. As they got over their initial shock, the girls all stood around my bed. Looking at me, Amber said, “How do you feel?”

“All in all, I’m feeling pretty good.” Chuckling, I said, “I just had my first breast and pelvic exam, so that was an interesting experience.”

“This must’ve been quite a shock to you.” Pausing, Morgan said, “I mean; I’d be so freaking out if I turned into a boy.”

“I freaked out a little bit after I found out; but other than that, I figure it really hasn’t hit me yet.” Looking at them, I said, “I suppose that’ll change once I have my first period.”

“Here’s a piece of friendly advice about that.” Looking at me, Amber said, “Always make sure you have an extra pad or tampon in your purse.”

“Amber, I’m sure the last thing Marcus wants to hear is something like that,” turning her attention to me, Morgan said, “If you need any help at all, you know you can count on us.”

“Really?”

“Please, after all the help you’ve given the squad the last few years, this is the least we could do.”

“Maybe you could even try out for the squad once you’re ready.” Looking at me, Michelle said, “All the times you recorded our routines, you probably know them just as well as us.”

I thought I saw Morgan quickly glare at Michelle, but I figured it was nothing. Turning to her, I said, “Thanks for the offer, but I don’t think I’m ready to be a cheerleader.”

The girls hung around for a few more minutes until they had to leave. After they said their goodbyes, they walked out the door. As they left, I could hear Amber saying, “I can’t believe his breasts are bigger than mine.”

Why is everyone so fixated on my breasts?
11112111111111.title: Some Visitors

111121111111111.content:
It had been 20 minutes since Mom left to go shopping, leaving me alone in the room. I was watching TV when I started to feel a little stir crazy. Grabbing the crutches the nurses had left for me, I decided to make my way to the playroom.

Walking into the room, I saw that the boy was spread out on the couch, reading a book. Going past him, I went to pick out a book for myself. As I looked through the selection, which was minimal at best, I found myself stealing glances at the boy. The more I looked at him, the more I started to feel a tingling sensation in my stomach.

With my chosen book in hand, I made my way over to the couch. "You mind if I sit here?"

"Sorry," he said, moving to make room. "Go right ahead."

Resting the crutches against the couch, I sat down and said, "Thanks."

"No problem." Looking at me, the boy said, "I haven't seen you around here before."

Remembering the cover story, I said, "I had surgery a few days ago to repair my ACL. There were some complications, so they kept me in the ICU until this morning. You?"

"I messed up my ankle pretty bad skateboarding." Pausing , he said, "My name's Troy. What's yours?"

Crap. A name was the one thing I hadn't thought of. I mean, I couldn't tell him my name was Marcus. After realizing I hadn't said anything for a moment, I looked at him and said the first name that popped into my head. "My name's Cassidy."

"Nice to meet you, Cassidy."

******************************


Troy and I didn't get much reading done after our introduction. We spent most of the time getting to know each other. I couldn't quite put my finger on it, but, the more we talked, the more I started to like Troy. He wasn't really tall, maybe a few inches taller than I was now. He wasn't all that muscular, but he wasn't scrawny, either.

We'd just finished talking about some of our hobbies, when I asked, "So, that girl I saw you with earlier, was that your sister?"

"Nope, she's not my sister." After a pause, he said, "She's actually my mom."

I was genuinely surprised to hear this. "She can't be older than 28, how could she be your mom?"

"She got pregnant when she was 15 years old," he explained. "After I was born, I was raised by my grandparents. For years, I thought that they were my parents, and that my mom was my sister."

I thought I had it rough learning that I'd been turned into a girl, but that was nothing compared to Troy. "That must have come as a surprise."

"You could say that."

I was about to say something when I heard someone else walk into the room. Looking up, I saw who I now knew to be Troy's mother walking toward us. "Who's your new friend, sweetie?"

"This is Cassidy."

"It's nice to meet you, Cassidy," she said, extending her hand. "I'm Troy's mother, Elena Wilson."

"It's nice to meet you, ma'am," I said, shaking her hand. "Your son seems really nice."

"He's been through a lot lately, so I'm glad to see him making friends." Turning to Troy, she said, "Come on, sweetie, the doctors want to take x-rays of your ankle."

"Okay." Getting up, Troy looked at me and said, "I'll see you later, Cassidy."

"See you later, Troy."

As I watched Troy and his mom leave, a surprising thought popped into my head - He's kind of cute.
111121111111111.title: Making a New Friend

1111211111111111.content:
I was still in the playroom when Mom returned from her shopping. She must’ve been looking for me; because when she walked in, she said, “There you are, sweetie.” Gesturing to the bags in her arms, Mom said, “Come on, I have some stuff for you to try on.”

As I grabbed the crutches, I said, “I thought you weren’t going to go overboard?”

“I wasn’t planning to, but there were some pretty good deals at the store.” Following me out of the room, Mom said, “I got you about half a dozen bras, a few pairs of underwear and 3 outfits for you to choose from.”

Once we got back to the room, Mom closed the door and handed me the bag containing the bras. As I looked through the bag, I said, “I always imagined my first experience with a bra would be taking one off a girl, not putting one on myself.”

“I can’t say this is something I ever imagine having to do.” Looking at me, Mom said, “If you need any help, just let me know.”

Walking towards the bathroom, I said, “Thanks.”

**********************


It took some doing but I finally managed to get the bra on without help from mom. As I stood in front of the mirror, looking at my reflection, I realized two things – the bra was surprisingly comfortable, and it made my boobs look amazing.

I was moving around, looking at my reflection from multiple angles, when there was a knock on the bathroom door. “Marcus, honey, are you alright in there?”

“Yeah Mom, I’m fine.” Bringing my hands up to my chest, I said, “I’m just getting used to this.”

After a few minutes, I was satisfied with what I saw. Opening the door, I walked out to show Mom. Looking at me, she said, “Just one piece of advice I want to give you – try to avoid walking around in just a bra.”

“I’ll take that under advisement.” Blushing, I said, “I just wanted to show you how it looked.”

“It looks good; but, more importantly, how does it feel?”

I wanted to tell Mom that I felt as if I was meant to be wearing one, but I decided against it. Looking at her, I simply said, “I thought it was going to feel weird, but it doesn’t.”

“Might I suggest wearing it for a few hours so you can get used to it.”

Before I could say anything, Troy walked into the room. He stopped dead in his tracks when he saw me in nothing but my bra. We both started blushing as I scrambled to cover myself. “H-Hey Troy.” Feeling embarrassed, I said, “H-How’d it go with the checkup? Is your ankle alright?”

“Tits getting better.”

I watched as Troy’s eyes bulged out. Looking at him, I said, “Excuse me?”

“I mean – it’s getting better.” Blushing, Troy said, “I-I can’t believe I just said that.”

While this was going on, Mom was just staring at the two of us. I could tell she wanted to know what was going on. Looking at her, I said, “Mom, this is my new friend Troy.”

“It’s nice to meet you, Troy.” A little defensive, Mom said, “Perhaps next time you should knock?”

“Sorry, ma’am.” Wincing, Troy said, “I-I just thought Cassidy might want to play some video games in the common room.”

Before Mom could question why Troy was calling me Cassidy, I said, “Sure, I’d love to.”

“Great, I’ll go get the system set up.”

Once Troy left the room, Mom turned to me and said, “So it’s Cassidy now?”

As I fixed the hospital gown, I said, “He asked me what my name was; I couldn’t exactly tell him my name is Marcus.”

“I suppose you’re right.” Looking at me, Mom said, “I guess this solves one problem – figuring out a new name for you.”

“That’s great, Mom.” Suddenly feeling anxious, I said, “Now if you don’t mind, I’ve kind of got plans.”

“I see you’re already starting to act like a teenage girl; wanting nothing to do with her parents.”

“It’s not that.” Sighing, I said, “It’s just...I don’t know.”

“Relax sweetie, go play video games with Troy.” With a smile, Mom said, “He seems like a nice, handsome young man.”

I couldn’t help but blush when Mom said Troy was handsome; not because of what she said, but because I agreed with her.
1111211111111111.title: Trying on Clothes

11112111111111111.content:
I made my way to the play area; walking into the room to find Troy just turning on the TV. Seeing me, he said, “They don’t have any M or T games, probably because kids use the room too.” Smiling, he said, “But they do have a copy of the latest Madden.”

“Let’s play that then.” Grabbing a controller, I said, “If I can kick my brother’s ass, I can kick yours too.”

As we both sat down on the couch, Troy looked at me and said, “I’m sorry if I embarrassed you earlier. Your mom is right, I should’ve knocked first.”

Truthfully I was more embarrassed by the looks I was getting from Glenn, but I didn’t want Troy to know that. “It’s no big deal.”

Looking at him, blushing a little, I said, “So did you...like what you saw?”

I didn’t need to have been an expert in body language to know when Troy was embarrassed. “Y-Your breasts were very nice.”

Now it was my turn to blush – a boy thought my breasts were very nice. With a smile, I said, “Thanks.”

**********************


We spent almost an hour playing the game; I was beating him by 3 touchdowns. The game was in the final seconds; my team had the ball and was making a run to the end zone. It looked like Troy was going to catch me, but I got lucky at the last second and scored the winning point. With a smile, I put the controller down and said, “And that’s how it’s done.”

“That was a good game.” Putting his controller down, Troy said, “I never met a girl who knew so much about football.”

If only you knew. “You should get out more; there are a few of us.”

Sitting back on the couch, Troy looked at me and said, “So what do you want to do now?”

“Maybe we can get to know each other a little better?” looking at Troy, I said, “Other than your living situation, I know very little about you.”

“There’s nothing much to tell really.” Looking at me, Troy said, “I’m just your average teenage boy; I like the outdoors, playing video games and watching TV. What about you?”

Oh boy, where do I start? “Well I live with my parents and my older brother. I start my freshman year next week. I’m kind of a tomboy; but other than that there’s not much else.”

I felt bad about lying to Troy; but I didn’t think he was ready for my big secret. We continued talking for a little while; during which I learned Troy’s family had moved to town a few weeks ago. We were going to be starting High School together – which part of me really enjoyed.
11112111111111111.title: Time With Troy

111121111111111111.content:
It was shortly after 4:30 in the afternoon. Mom had left a short time earlier to go home for the evening. She felt bad about leaving me in the hospital, but there wasn’t much we could do about it. I assured her that I’d be fine and would call if anything came up.

I was lying in bed, with my leg brace off, watching TV, when my cell phone rang. Reaching over to the nightstand, I saw that it was Kat calling. Answering it, I said, “Hey, Kat.”

“That new voice of yours is going to take some getting used to.”

“Tell me about it.” Chuckling, I said, “What’s up?”

“Not much, I was just calling to see how you were doing.” Sighing, Kat said, “I saw your mom parking in the driveway; thought you might be feeling kind of lonely.”

“I’m fine, actually.” Thinking about Troy, I smiled and said, “I met this boy; he’s our age. We’ve been hanging out.”

“Does this boy have a name?” pausing, Kat said, “What’s he like?”

“His name’s Troy; he’s in here because he messed up his ankle.” Chuckling, I said, “I guess you could say he’s sweet, kind of easy on the eyes.”

Kat’s shock was evident in her tone. “Did you just say what I think you said?”

“You heard me right.” Pausing, I said, “What’s the big deal?”

“Girl, I think you have a crush on this guy.”

I don’t know what was more surprising; Kat calling me girl, or her saying I was crushing on Troy. “That’s crazy; I-I like girls.”

“Marcus, I’ve known you for years; I know when you’re crushing on someone.” Sighing, Kat said, “I honestly never expected that you’d be crushing on a guy though.”

I wasn’t really paying attention to what Kat was saying; as I was thinking over everything in my head. The butterflies in my stomach, the way I felt when he accidentally touched my hand – it all made sense. “Oh my god, I’ve got a crush on Troy.” Shocked, I said, “H-How can this be happening? I-I like girls.”

“I won’t pretend to understand the science, but you’re a girl now.” Pausing, Kat said, “Boy's brains are wired differently than girl's brains.”

Kat did have a point; boys were wired differently than girls were. I just imagined that, if anything were to change, it wouldn’t be so sudden. “What does all this mean for, well, us?” taking a breath, I said, “You were so psyched about us dating, but now that’s all out the window.”

“I love you, Marcus.” Sighing, Kat said, “Would I have preferred to love you as my boyfriend, sure I would have. But I’ll still love you as a girl – just probably not in the way either of us had planned.”

“So I guess that makes us...girlfriends?”

“I was thinking more like sisters.” Chuckling, Kat said, “I always thought of you as an older brother; but now that you’re a girl...”

“Now that I’m a girl, I’m suddenly your slightly older sister?”

“That’s right.” Pausing, Kat said, “I’ve got to go, my Mom needs help in the kitchen. If you’re up to it, I’d like to come to visit tomorrow.”

“I’d like that.” Smiling, I said, “You can give me advice on this whole Troy situation.”

“I’d very much like to meet this guy; make sure he’s good enough for you.”

“Give me some credit, Kat.” Chuckling, I said, “I’m pretty sure I know which guys are the good ones.”

“Goodnight, Marcus.”

“Good night, Kat.”

It was only after we’d hung up that I realized I forgot something – telling Kat that my name was now Cassidy.
111121111111111111.title: Later On

1111211111111111111.content:
It was just before 6:00, and I’d just finished having a fairly decent burger and fries for dinner. After putting the tray on the table, I wondered what I would do now. It didn’t take long for me to get an idea – Troy had mentioned he enjoyed the James Bond movies, and I remembered hearing about a marathon on TNT. Maybe he’d like to watch it with me.

Putting my brace back on, I made my way down the hall to Troy’s room. I noticed the door was ajar; I was about to knock when I heard voices inside. I quickly recognized them as Troy and his mom.

“You seemed to enjoy spending time with Cassidy today.”

“I really did.” Chuckling, Troy said, “She’s not like other girls I’ve met; she likes football and likes playing the same video games that I do.”

“It sounds to me like you have a crush on her.”

I blushed when I heard that – my crush may have a crush on me. “I-I don’t know if I’d go that far, Mom.” Pausing, Troy said, “I mean she’s nice, and she’s attractive, but I just met her.”

He thinks I’m attractive!! Moving closer to the door, careful not to let them see me, I continued to listen. It was a good thing there weren’t any nurses around, because they’d probably yell at me for eavesdropping. “It’s okay to be a little afraid, honey.” Placing her hand on Troy’s, his Mom said, “I realize it didn’t work out well with Amy, but I have a feeling this time will be different.”

I started to wonder who Amy was; and what had happened to Troy to make him hesitant to tell me something. “Didn’t work out well?” getting annoyed, Troy said, “That jerk, who I thought was my best friend, left me for dead because he found out I was born a girl.”

I gasped when I heard that; too late to realize that it was loud enough for Troy and his Mom to hear. I turned to head back to my room, only I was stopped by Troy’s mom grabbing my shoulder. Looking at me, she said, “I think we need to talk, Cassidy.”
1111211111111111111.title: A Shocking Surprise

11112111111111111111.content:
